markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Kitsune Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2618) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You excel at navigating social situations and keeping secrets. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) and [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Kitsune Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Kitsune Lore
